RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 5F Turf CR: 71. Claiming Purse 17000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $20,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BRAVE CITY GIRL forwardly placed early along the inside, covered up in traffic into and through the turn, steered out for room in upper stretch when straightened for home, a bit unruly, late surge to close with determination and be up in time. RUMPUS away in good order, raced closest to the leader just off the inside up the backstretch, continued to pursue that one into the stretch, challenged nearing the furlong grounds, gained the advantage, led late, could not contain the winner. SWEET SASSICAIA in the second flight in the two path and outside the winner, angled three wide into the lane, some late interest to be up for the show. TARGET VISION underwent a shoe repair in the paddock, broke sharp from the outside, cleared to the inside, showed the way into and through the turn along the rail, responded briefly when confronted nearing the furlong grounds then caved in to lose several positions. TWO JET bit restless in the gate, was last to leave, raced back off the pace off the rail, angled out to be four wide into the straight, improved position a bit without posing a serious threat. MRS. NECAISE broke back,lacked speed, also staged a mild rally to better position a bit the final furlong. COPPER MOON within striking distance early, three wide into the lane, had little for the run to the wire. MISS G G fidgety in the gate, hopped slightly at the break, main body outside up the backstretch, five wide into the turn, moved toward the inside into the lane and went evenly to the wire. RAISE THE PRAISE fell back to trail after the start, failed to menace. ZINASDESTINYVIRAGO in mid pack off the inside for three furlongs, swung five wide into the lane, lacked a closing kick.

ENTRY.NAME: Brave City Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward rail in traffic, moved out, late surge

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Sassicaia
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight 2p, angled 3w, some late interest, up 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Raise the Praise
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, did not menace

ENTRY.NAME: Copper Moon
ENTRY.OWNER: Stumpf Donna and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, little left drive

ENTRY.NAME: Rumpus
ENTRY.COMMENT: closest to leader, bid upper, led late, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Mrs. Necaise
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, lacked speed, mildly to improve

ENTRY.NAME: Two Jet
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, raced back off pace, angled 4w, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Zinasdestinyvirago
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack off the inside, swung 5w into lane, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Miss G G
ENTRY.OWNER: Guidry MD George Gary Guidry Ruth and Eddie Delahoussaye Bloodstock LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: fidgety gate, hopped slightly, 5w into turn,dropped in,even drive

ENTRY.NAME: Target Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, cleared to the inside, pace, caved in final furlong

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 11, 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 11, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 11, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since June 1 1, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ADIEU LE CHAT in the second flight up the backstretch along the inside, asked along in the turn, steered three wide into the stretch when beginning to advance, bid between horses past the furlong marker, dug in and proved best in game fashion. TANGO CHARLIE also in the second group early, three wide through much of the turn, floated out five wide into the stretch when the winner steered out, challenged with that one with a furlong to run, led, outkicked in the late going while clear for the place. COACH KENNY broke a bit outward, void of early foot in trailing early, came six wide for the drive, staged a belated rally down the middle of the strip to be in time for the show. WAR SONG back off the pace inside, continued to save ground turn, cut the corner into the lane to improve significantly then flattened out in the final furlong. PRAY IDE SING in the second flight while between the top two, angled out when moving with that pair out of the turn, came up empty in the final furlong to finish up evenly. OVERDELIVER away well outside, dueled in the two path through some glib early fractions, faltered the final furlong. LT. BONURA lacked early foot, failed to muster a rally when called on at the head of the lane. TRAELEE last to leave, remained back. REECE'S PRIORITY dueled up front closest to the inside through those lively fractions for a half and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Adieu Le Chat
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight inside, steered 3w into lane, bid btwn foes,determined

ENTRY.NAME: War Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, cut corner to improve, flattened out late

ENTRY.NAME: Traelee
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Lt. Bonura
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, failed to muster a rally

ENTRY.NAME: Pray Ide Sing
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight btwn foes, 4w into lane, no late punch

ENTRY.NAME: Coach Kenny
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of early foot, 6w into lane, late rally, up 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Reece's Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled just off the inside, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Tango Charlie
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace inside, floated 5w into lane, bid, led, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Overdeliver
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front 2p, faltered final furlong

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 5F Turf CR: 66. Claiming Purse 16000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CANT ATTACK ARCH broke alertly, cleared toward the inside, showed the way into the turn,shrugged off nearest pursuer turning for home, stayed clear to the wire under steady handling. FIRE VISION chased the winner up the backstretch into the turn, briefly moved closer to that one late in the turn, could do little more with that rival to prove second best in holding sway for the place late. JUST A WIN broke out, fell back to trail, two path into the lane, rallied through some traffic to be along for the show, slowly getting to the runner up late. BLACK ACE broke back, saved ground turn, improved along the rail into the lane, closest to the top two a furlong out, flattened, caught for the show. JUST ANOTHER WIN lacked speed outside, five wide exiting the turn, improved a bit. DR STRICKLANDS ACE forwardly placed early, fell back before three furlongs, some traffic midstretch. FOLLOW THROUGH back off the early pace, moved closer from between horses late in the turn, faltered through the stretch. HIGH ARABIAN mid pack early, steadily faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Fire Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, mild bid late turn, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Dr Stricklands Ace
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed early, fell back

ENTRY.NAME: Black Ace
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, improved inside, flattened, caught 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Just a Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail,rallied show through traffic

ENTRY.NAME: Follow Through
ENTRY.COMMENT: closer between horses, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: High Arabian
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadily faded

ENTRY.NAME: Cant Attack Arch
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, cleared toward rail, shrugged off foe

ENTRY.NAME: Just Another Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 5w into lane, improved bit

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 54. Maiden Claiming Purse 10000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WICKED TOUGH forwardly placed in the run up the backstretch inside, patiently handled while creeping closer while covered up in traffic from midway on the turn until late in the bend, split foes entering the stretch, challenged, gained the advantage and edged away late in finishing up willingly. HOLIDAY RUN back off the pace while toward the inside, followed the winner into the lane when moving closer, lodged a brief bid inside that rival and between horses with less than a furlong remaining, no match late to prove second best. CHIPEEE broke well from the outside, pressed the issue into and through the turn in the three path, could not match the top two late, came back for the show. HALF CRAZY broke on top, showed the way up the backstretch and through the turn, headed by the winner a furlong out, weakened. TRUVY'S BANDIT broke back, lacked speed for three furlongs, came four wide out of the turn, displayed some mild late interest down the middle of the strip. WILDCATS'S MEOW forwardly placed outside, moved slightly closer while four wide through the turn, had little for the drive. HOLIDAY FOREVER broke slowly, moved closer five wide with a move through the turn, failed to sustain that advance through the stretch in tiring. MINE YOUR BIZ void of speed, raced outside, four wide through the turn, picked off a couple of tiring rivals after the issue had been decided. ALWAYS LOGAN lacked speed out in the strip, five wide turning for home, remained back. CHELSEA'S GLORY was finished early, trailed in.

ENTRY.NAME: Chelsea's Glory
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early

ENTRY.NAME: Holiday Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace,closer inside,brief bid btwn foes 1/16,2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Truvy's Bandit
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, lacked speed, 4w into lane, mild late interest

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Tough
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward inside,traffic 1/4, split foes into lane, edged away late

ENTRY.NAME: Half Crazy
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, pace inside, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Mine Your Biz
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, 4w, passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Always Logan
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 5w into lane, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Holiday Forever
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, 5w middle move turn, faltred

ENTRY.NAME: Chipeee
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted the pace outside, 3w turn, came back for show

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcats's Meow
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed outside, 4w turn, little for drive

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 84. Starter Allowance Purse 18000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5000 OR LESS IN ONE OF THEIR LAST FIVE STARTS. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 11, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Sin ce June 11, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHIEF CHARLIE bothered a bit when forwardly placed in the first turn, angled in to be clear onto the backstretch, moved a bit closer just off the inside into the far turn, engaged the leader soon after, clear in upper stretch, drifted out late under a steady left handed crop as the runner up was challenging, gained the nod over that rival at the wire. IZZY'S BABY BOY settled off the pace toward the inside, moved a bit closer after a half, chased the dueling leaders through the second bend, challenged outside the winner, bothered slightly when that one drifted out in the waning strides, missed. I'M D'CAT unhurried early, slightly closer toward the inside second turn, switched out nearing the furlong marker around the tiring early leader, mild rally to be along for the show, not a threat to the top two. BELLO CREEDO fractious in the gate, broke on top, sprinted clear soon after the start, showed the way through the first turn and up the backstretch, offered brief resistance when the winner came alongside far turn, began to gradually weaken when headed by that one soon after. COOL INDIVIDUAL back off the pace, improved into the lane after moving around a tiring rival turning for home, not a serious threat. MIAS MOONBEAM in mid pack off the inside, four wide far turn, went flat through the lane in lacking a closing response. EAST LEX a bit restless in the gate, fell back to trail after the start, passed a couple of weakening foes while never a threat. COLONIST antsy in the gate, off a bit slow when a bit unprepared, remained back and was never a factor. COMPLEX SYSTEM chased early, gave way. FOLLOWING A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER OF IZZY'S BABY BOY AGAINST THE WINNER FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE IN DEEP STRETCH, THE RESULT WAS ALLOWED TO STAND.

ENTRY.NAME: Cool Individual
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, improved into lane, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Bello Creedo
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, sprinted clear, pace, weakened when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Izzy's Baby Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, chased duel 3w 2nd, late bid, slight bother late,missed

ENTRY.NAME: Chief Charlie
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered bit 1st turn, closer, took over 2nd, drifted late, nod

ENTRY.NAME: Mias Moonbeam
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 4w far turn, flat through the lane

ENTRY.NAME: I'm d'Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, saved ground 2nd, switched out, along 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Colonist
ENTRY.COMMENT: antsy gate, off slow, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Complex System
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: East Lex
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate, trailed, passed tiring foes

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 5F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CUSTOM PRAYER within striking distance into the turn off the inside, moved closer into a challenging position turning for home, engaged the leader in upper stretch, dueled past the furlong marker, edged clear under steady handling. DIAL UNCLE JOEY in mid early early between foes, lost position in traffic through the turn, four wide into the stretch, encountered additional traffic with a furlong to run, finished up willingly when clear to earn the place. THA ILLEST DEAL broke alertly, cleared before a furlong, continued to show the way through the turn and into the stretch, responded when the winner challenged upper stretch, dueled with that one past the furlong marker, could not match strides late, caught for the place in the final strides. RAZZ in the second flight off the inside, came four to five wide wide out of the turn, lacked a winning kick behind the two leaders with a furlong to run. STRAY CAT STRUT broke back, was five wide and behind horses into the lane, improved position with some moderate late interest. PALANTE shuffled back just after the start, lacked speed, three wide into the stretch, traffic with a furlong to run, waited, finished up evenly. ST JOE back off the pace well wide, fanned six wide into the stretch, improved a bit outside of traffic through upper stretch then flattened out in the late going. FRIEND'S DO CARE in the second flight while between horses for, began to weaken when nearing midstretch. CARLOS'S MAMA off a bit slow, trailed most of the way in remaining back. GEM OF CARLOS in the main body inside, waited behind traffic late in the turn, came up empty in the run to the wire. COTTONCLUB SOLDIER away in good order, chased the early leader, began a steady retreat after a quarter.

ENTRY.NAME: Gem of Carlos
ENTRY.COMMENT: main body, traffic, waited rail 1/4, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Palante
ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled back start, back, 3w into lane, traffic 1/8, even late

ENTRY.NAME: Dial Uncle Joey
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack,traffic far turn,4w into lane, traffic again 1/8,willing

ENTRY.NAME: Cottonclub Soldier
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, steady retreat

ENTRY.NAME: Tha Illest Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, cleared early, dueled, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Friend's Do Care
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight between, weakened through the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Carlos's Mama
ENTRY.COMMENT: off bit slow,m trailed most of way

ENTRY.NAME: Razz
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, 5w into the lane, lacked a winning kick late

ENTRY.NAME: Custom Prayer
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, closer late turn 3w, dueled, edged clr

ENTRY.NAME: Stray Cat Strut
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, five wide into the lane, some late interest

ENTRY.NAME: St Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, fanned six wide into the lane, improved,flattened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 7 1/2F Turf CR: 78. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 36000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $50,000 WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACE. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5 0,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CALICOCO cleared soon after the break, rated kindly while set a relaxed set of early fractions, remained clear into the stretch, held a steady advantage to the wire while kept to pressure. RANCH WATER forwardly placed, moved closest to the winner after a half, chased that one into the stretch, could do little with that one through the stretch, clearly second best. CREEKSIDE settled off the early pace, asked for run second turn, along for the show with a mild rally, not a threat to the top two. MANLY DEEDS four wide into the first turn, moved up to chase the winner onto the backstretch, continued to head up the first flight from the outside then began to weaken in the final turn. THE BOSS SOSS closest to the winner early, fell back into the second flight, had nothing left for the drive. BUCK DOLL TAYLOR lacked speed in trailing early, failed to mount a bid. TACTICAL VISION fell back after the start, also lacked a closing rally. Z'S GUITAR last away then bobbled soon after, finished after a half, trailed home.

ENTRY.NAME: Ranch Water
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, bit closer, second best

ENTRY.NAME: The Boss Soss
ENTRY.COMMENT: closest to the winner early, fell back, nothing for drive

ENTRY.NAME: Creekside
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled early, asked second turn, mild rally show

ENTRY.NAME: Calicoco
ENTRY.COMMENT: cleared after alert break, soft pace, plenty left

ENTRY.NAME: Tactical Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back, lacked a rally

ENTRY.NAME: Z's Guitar
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, early bobble, trailed home

ENTRY.NAME: Buck Doll Taylor
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Manly Deeds
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w 1st turn, chased, little left

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 97. Allowance Purse 33000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR STATE BRED ALW AT A MILE OR OVER SINCE AUGUST 10, 2022. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 11, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since May 11, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Such A Race Since April 11 Allowed 7 lbs. (Maiden, Claiming, And Starter Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MACHINE GUN MAN broke on top, showed the way through the first turn, continued to set the pace up the backstretch, responded when challenged second turn, rebuffed that rival into the stretch, drew out through the stretch under steady handling. COSMIC TRAIN void of speed in trailing for six furlongs, swung out four wide turning for home, finished willingly to be up late for the place, not a threat to the winner. STRONG EAGLE forwardly placed off the rail but inside horses first turn, idled in the run up the backstretch while remaining in striking position, lodged a sudden move to challenge outside the winner far turn, briefly dueled with that one then could not keep up through the stretch, caught late for the second spot. BAYOU JAM settled off the pace, raced in the second flight the middle half, lacked a serious response in the drive, not enough for the second spot. BALLINONABUDJET broke out and lastly, continued back, failed to rallty. RIGHTANDJUST chased the winner early well off the inside, gave way after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Machine Gun Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, pace off rail, rebuffed foe, rebroke, drew out

ENTRY.NAME: Bayou Jam
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, 2nd flight, lacked serious kick drive,not enough for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Cosmic Train
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, swung 4w into lane, willingly, up late 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Eagle
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward, idled backstretch, quick move far turn, stalled

ENTRY.NAME: Ballinonabudjet
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out and lastly, back, failed to rally

ENTRY.NAME: Rightandjust
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early outside, gave way after half

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 7 1/2F Turf CR: 60. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRACE HAZEL broke on top, showed the way into the first turn, set a pressured but soft pace the middle half, shook clear through the stretch. SWEET ALEXIS carried out into the first turn when closest to the winner, pressured that one up the backstretch off the inside, dueled late in the final turn, could not keep up through the stretch, clearly second best. TAP IRON FIST broke in, bumped foe, settled off the pace, came on the outside for the drive, proved no match for the top two. PORTO DEL ACE got out into the first turn to carry out the runner up, continued forwardly for a half, came up empty for the drive. EASY ACES bumped, squeezed back start, trailed, improved slightly without posing a threat. REINE LE FER off a step slow, raced back, failed to menace. DELTA NIGHTS in mid pack for five furlongs, faded through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Grace Hazel
ENTRY.OWNER: Guidry MD George Gary Guidry Ruth and Eddie Delahoussaye Bloodstock LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, set a soft pace, shook clear, held

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Dr. & Mrs. G. Gary Guidry & Mr. & Mrs.Eddie Delahoussaye

ENTRY.NAME: Delta Nights
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, faded through the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: squeezed back start, trailed, improved slightly, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Tap Iron Fist
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, bump foe, settled, moved out, no match top two

ENTRY.NAME: Porto Del Ace
ENTRY.COMMENT: got out into first turn, forward, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Alexis
ENTRY.COMMENT: carried out 1st turn, pressed, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Reine Le Fer
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, raced back, failed to menace
